title: 2 Bd CONDO FOR RENT
posting_body: Beautiful 2 bedrooms / 2 bath condo in the heart of Troy, located minutes from Somerset Mall, restaurants, Troy Aquatic center, Troy public library, Beaumont hospitals, convenient located right off I-75 and major objects.

Private entrance to the main level offers a master suite with private full bath and walk-in closet; second bedroom with full bath and a lovely kitchen with granite countertops and appliances (Refrigerator, dishwasher, range, and microwave)
Lower level offers a large bonus room that can be used as an office/ bedroom with egress window and walk-in closed; laundry and garage access.
NO SMOKERS of any type of tobacco products including vaping.
